attributes.action: Maintain the right for our children to have single vaccines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although the Law of England allows children to have single vaccines as immunisation against Measles, Mumps and Rubella the NHS only provide the combined MMR vaccine. Singles vaccines are obtainable privately but providers have difficulties in obtaining supplies due to unclear regulations and political interference.
A law passed in 1896 and again in 1906 made all vaccines non compulsory to allow parental choice.
The purpose of this petition is to:-
Force an independent study on the efficacy of the MMR combined vaccine. 
Ensure availability of all vaccines to facilitate parental choice.

government_responses.details:
